channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Groundskeeper
channel.description:
#[color=brown]The Groundskeeper - Neutral Killing[/color]
**Passive Abilities:** Immune to Occupy | Immune to Conversion
**Day Ability:** Stalk Find out who your target is targetting at the beginning of the night and get some idea of what their class is.
**Night Ability:** Bury Alive Bury your target alive and take thier place. They will vanish from court. Their class will show as "Unknown" and Physician cannot exhume the player. You will know their class and journal.
**Goal:** Win with Surviving Neutrals
**Lore:**
_For a long time, Castle Adiart's gardens remained a beautiful sight, all thanks to the Groundskeeper. But when members of the court trample on his finely cut grass or his freshly grown flowers, his temper gets the better of him._
_The Groundskeeper was never one for killing, he simply only ever wanted to tend the gardens and keep everything tidy but it was a hard task when they constantly had people running all over the place at night._
_The only thing that he could do was ensure they could not. He would stalk somebody at night to find out what they were doing. Sometimes would bury them alive only to take their place at the court to find out what else is going on._

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Groundskeeper
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
And what do you mean by “take their place”?

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Groundskeeper

item.description:
How many uses of each ability?

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Groundskeeper
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
Well, yeah, sort of. I went with a kinda mixture of Janitor/Disguiser.

They’ll just show up with their name in the day

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Groundskeeper
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
ThePlex:

and take thier place

This would make this ability useless, like ToS’s old disguiser. (also, *their)

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The Groundskeeper
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
#The Groundskeeper - Neutral Killing

Passive Abilities: Immune to Occupy | Immune to Conversion

Day Ability: Stalk
Find out who your target is targetting at the beginning of the night and get some idea of what their class is.

Night Ability: Bury Alive
Bury your target alive and take thier place. They will vanish from court. Their class will show as “Unknown” and Physician cannot exhume the player. You will know their class and journal.

Goal: Win with Surviving Neutrals

Lore:

For a long time, Castle Adiart’s gardens remained a beautiful sight, all thanks to the Groundskeeper. But when members of the court trample on his finely cut grass or his freshly grown flowers, his temper gets the better of him.

The Groundskeeper was never one for killing, he simply only ever wanted to tend the gardens and keep everything tidy but it was a hard task when they constantly had people running all over the place at night.

The only thing that he could do was ensure they could not. He would stalk somebody at night to find out what they were doing. Sometimes would bury them alive only to take their place at the court to find out what else is going on.

Read full topic
